$AAPL $NVDA $WB Dow futures imply a more than 350-point loss at Thursday's open, as stock market rout continues https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/10/dow-futures-point-to-more-than-100-point-drop-on-thursday-as-october-stock-market-rout-continues.html

links.title: Dow futures point to more than 100-point drop on Thursday as October stock-market rout continues
links.description: Overnight Dow Jones industrial average futures opened lower by 43 points, signaling the October stock market drop that intensified on Wednesday will continue on Thursday. The futures implied the Dow will open Thursday down by 130 points. Overnight S&P 500 futures were off by 0.2 percent, shortly after they began trading at 6 pm E.T.

Dow Plunges 832 Points, Sell-Off Bleeds Into the Crypto Market
https://sludgefeed.com/dow-plunges-832-points-sell-off-bleeds-into-crypto-market/
$SPY $SPX $BTC.X $ETH.X $XRP.X $AAPL $DJIA $AMZN

links.title: Dow Plunges 832 Points, Sell-Off Bleeds Into the Crypto Market
links.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average just experienced its third-worst day by total points lost, falling 832 points (-3.15%) on Wednesday. The market drop was primarily driven by the tech sector, with the Nasdaq down over 4% and the Technology Select Sector SPDR (XLK ) down 4.85%.

messages.body: Damn -250 $DJIA rip $AAPL $SPY $BAC
The Battle for the Home - Stratechery $amzn $goog $aapl https://stratechery.com/2018/the-battle-for-the-home/

links.title: The Battle for the Home
links.description: If the first stage of competition in consumer technology was the race to be the computer users went to (won by Microsoft and the PC), and the second was to be the computer users carried with them (won by Apple in terms of profits, and Google in terms of marketshare), the outlines of the current battle came sharply into focus over the last month: what company will win the race to be the computer within which users live?
